name: ! I am bored
description:
Feeling bored? Time is passing by depressingly slow? It's time to download “I'm bored”, a simple, but addicting mini game, and become a shark among the other fish in the sea.

Whenever you say “I'm bored”, you'll think of this simple mini game. Play it for free and it will get you out of the blue mood within seconds!

HOW TO PLAY:

◆ TAP the screen to make the fish “jump”
◆ BOUNCE off the walls to score points
◆ DON'T touch the spikes!
◆ COLLECT coins to buy another fish from the shop.


FEATURES:

◆ Different background colors
◆ Higher score = harder gameplay
◆ 50 different fish to buy with collected coins
◆ 2 players mode – find an opponent to play against on the same screen
◆ Share high scores on social networks
◆ Earn free coins to go shopping at the I'm bored shop


TWO PLAYERS MODE:

Choose the 2 players mode and play against your opponent on the same device. Play on different sides of the screen, bounce off the walls and off one another as long as you can. The first to win 3 duels is the winner of the 2 players challenge.

There are so many fish in the sea. Be the fish with the highest score and remember, the spikes are not your friends.
